PISTOL.strategy: **2-1-2 Setup**: 2 players A (default/triple), 1 player mid (connector), 2 players B (apps/site). Mid player calls rotations, A players trade frag.
**Aggressive Mid**: 3 players mid (connector/window), 1 player A, 1 player B. Mid players push for picks, A/B hold retake positions.
**Stack A**: 3 players A site (default, triple, quad), 2 players mid/B. Focus on A retakes, mid players rotate fast on B contact.
**Connector Hold**: 2 players A, 2 players connector/mid, 1 player B. Connector players hold aggressively, deny T mid control.
**Anti-Rush A**: 3 players A (close angles), 1 player mid, 1 player B. A players play crossfires against ramp rushes.
**Rotational**: 1 player A, 2 players mid, 2 players B. Play for information, fast rotates. Mobile defense setup.
**Palace Control**: 2 players A, 3 players mid/palace. Palace players push for picks, deny T palace control.
**B Stack**: 1 player A, 1 player mid, 3 players B. Force Ts to A, play for fast rotates with utility.
**Window Focus**: 2 players A, 2 players mid (window control), 1 player B. Window player holds angle for picks.
**Info Play**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. Conservative angles, information gathering focus.

ECO.strategy: **Stack A Close**: 4 players A site (close angles), 1 player B. Upgraded pistols, close-range trades. B player saves.
**Aggressive Mid**: 3 players mid with upgraded pistols, 2 players save. Mid players push connector, savers hold retakes.
**B Stack Save**: 1 player A (save), 4 players B close angles. Upgraded pistols B, overwhelm apps area.
**Connector Push**: 2 players A, 3 players mid (connector push). Mid players armor+pistol, aggressive early contact.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players A close, 2 players mid/B save. A players upgraded pistols, crossfire setups.
**Full Save**: All save completely. 2 A, 1 mid, 2 B. Passive angles, survival and information focus.
**Palace Push**: 2 players A, 3 players mid (palace push). Mid players upgraded pistols, deny palace access.
**Window Control**: 2 players A, 2 players mid (window focus), 1 player B save. Window player upgraded pistol.
**Retake Focus**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. All save, retake utility coordination.
**Mixed Buy**: 2 players A (1 upgraded), 2 players mid (1 upgraded), 1 player B save. Selective upgrades.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **Rifle Mid**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles hold long angles.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Strong A hold.
**Connector Control**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG). Mid rifles hold connector.
**Anti-Execute**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long, SMGs retake.
**Palace Rifle**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles palace), 1 player B (save). Palace rifles control.
**Balanced**: 2 players A (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 2 players mid (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 1 player B (rifle).
**B Heavy**: 2 players A (SMGs), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Strong B defense.
**Window Rifle**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle window), 1 player B (SMG). Window rifle for picks.
**Aggressive Mid**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles push). Mid rifles take map control.
**Retake Setup**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Retake focus.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **Standard 2-1-2**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (AWP), 2 players B (rifles). AWP connector/window.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (rifles + utility), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (rifle). Strong A defense.
**Mid Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players mid (AWP + 2 rifles). Heavy mid presence, fast rotations.
**Connector Deny**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles + utility), 1 player B (rifle). Smoke connector.
**Anti-Split**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles), 1 player B (rifle + utility). Split defense focus.
**AWP Window**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (1 AWP window, 1 rifle), 1 player B (rifle). Window AWP picks.
**Palace Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players mid (rifles + AWP palace). Palace control with utility.
**B Stack**: 1 player A (rifle), 2 players mid (rifles), 2 players B (rifles). Force A plays, fast rotates.
**Retake Heavy**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (rifles + utility). Retake coordination.
**Aggressive Setup**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles push), 1 player B (rifle). Mid map control.

PISTOL.strategy: **A Ramp Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush A ramp with coordinated pop-flashes. First two players clear default/triple.
**B Apps Rush**: 4 players rush B apartments with armor and flashes. 1 player goes mid for late rotate.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (1 with smoke), 2 players A ramp. Mid players smoke connector, take mid control.
**A Split**: 2 players A ramp, 3 players mid to connector. Ramp players smoke stairs, execute split timing.
**Palace Control**: 3 players palace with utility, 2 players A ramp. Palace players smoke connector/jungle.
**B Default**: 2 players B apps, 2 players mid, 1 player A ramp. Play for picks and information.
**Mid to B**: All 5 players go mid, smoke connector and jungle. Flash over smokes, execute B site.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A ramp with utility, 2 players position palace. Execute B after rotations.
**Underpass Play**: 2 players A ramp, 2 players mid, 1 player underpass. Underpass flanks on contact.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players A ramp, 2 players B apps, 1 player mid. Create pressure simultaneously.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven A Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush A ramp together with pop-flashes.
**Stack B Apps**: All 5 players stack B apartments. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles.
**Palace Lurk**: 1 player lurks palace with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy A ramp.
**Deagle Mid**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor mid, 3 players support with utility. Deagles take long angles.
**Connector Rush**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols, rush connector from mid. 1 player saves.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven A ramp, 2 players save. Force players smoke stairs.
**B Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols B apps, 3 players save mid.
**Mid Control**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols mid, 2 players save. Fight for picks.
**Split Save**: 2 players force A ramp, 2 players force B apps, 1 player saves mid.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 A ramp, 2 B apps, 1 mid. Exit frags only.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles A ramp, 1 rifle mid, SMGs support.
**Mid Presence**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A ramp, 1 rifle B apps. Mid rifles smoke connector.
**B Apps Take**: 2 rifles B apps, 2 SMGs mid, 1 rifle A ramp. Apps rifles clear apartments.
**Palace Control**: 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs A ramp. Mid players smoke connector.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle A ramp, 1 rifle mid, 1 rifle B apps, 2 SMGs floating.
**Ramp Focus**: 4 players A ramp (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle mid. Ramp players smoke stairs.
**Connector Split**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A ramp, 1 rifle B apps. Execute A split through connector.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Underpass Control**: 2 rifles A ramp, 2 SMGs mid (1 underpass), 1 rifle B apps.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles key angles, SMGs support.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Execute**: Smoke stairs + connector, flash over smokes. 3 players A ramp, 2 players connector.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid with full utility, 2 players A ramp. Mid players smoke connector + window.
**B Split**: 2 players B apps, 3 players mid to connector. Smoke connector + jungle, flash over.
**Palace Take**: 4 players mid, 1 player A ramp. Mid players smoke connector + window, take palace.
**Default Setup**: 2 A ramp, 2 mid, 1 B apps. AWPer mid, riflers A ramp. Play for picks.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A ramp with utility, 2 players position mid. Execute B.
**Window Control**: 3 players mid, 2 players A ramp. Mid players smoke window, take control.
**B Apps Execute**: 4 players B apps with full utility, 1 player mid lurk. Apps players smoke balcony.
**Anti-Stack A**: Heavy utility on A ramp, 4 players execute A site. 1 player mid watches rotations.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute B through connector.
